definition: to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format
to put/to place/to release/to free/to let go/to let out/to set off (fireworks)

pinyin: kai1 fang4 xi4 tong3 hu4 lian2

sentences.english: The rest of this article focuses on the integrated and open system characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 本文關於集成和開放系統特性的其他信息。

sentences.english: To make a model . The aspects of an application process pertinent to OSI.
sentences.chinese: 應用進程與開放系統互連模型相關的各個方面。

sentences.english: An open system architecture that enables rapid software upgrades and requires less hardware.
sentences.chinese: 開放系統架構，能夠快速軟件升級，需要較少的硬件。

sentences.english: So my question would be, what is your opinion on open systems?
sentences.chinese: 因此，我的問題是，什麼是您認爲在開放系統？
